original_title: Pink Floyd: A Momentary Lapse of Reason - Rehearsal 1987
overview: DVD with a Pink Floyd rehearsal, recorded in August 1987 in a hangar of the "Toronto Pearson Aiport" in Canada, where they were preparing to present the world tour of the album "A Momentary Lapse of Reason".
tagline: PINK FLOYD: Momentary Lapse of Reason - Rehearsal - 1987
title: Pink Floyd: A Momentary Lapse of Reason - Rehearsal 1987
